nodes.text: A Cassandra Sunrise was an intoxicating beverage, consisting of several Starshine Surprises in the same glass. It was said to be too potent to drink, but would make an excellent sunburn salve for those with extremely thick skin. During the Galactic War, the Republic Strategic Information Service agent codenamed "Hunter" attempted to attract the attention of a woman in a bar on Nar Shaddaa who was drinking a Cassandra Sunrise. She left, leaving the drink behind.
